text: "14" is a song by American singer Paula Cole, from her fourth studio album, Courage. It was released on April 3, 2007. ==Background== "14" was released as the first single from her fourth studio album, Courage. The song consists of genres like rock. The song never entered the Billboard charts. ==Track listing== * Digital download "14" - 3:38 ==References== Category:Paula Cole songs Category:2007 singles Category:Songs written by Patrick Leonard Category:Songs written by Paula Cole Category:2007 songs Category:Decca Records singles
title: 14 (song)
